resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of serverless state management; critical for data integrity.
alternative_approach: Split into smaller tasks: Pagination Logic vs State Persistence
risk_factors: Logic complexity may exceed estimated time; debugging recursive workers is difficult.
mitigation_strategy: Pair programming with Backend Dev for initial architecture; strict unit testing.

resource_notes: Selecting correct MergeTree engines is vital for query performance.
alternative_approach: Consult ClickHouse documentation or external expert if optimization fails.
risk_factors: Suboptimal schema will require painful migrations later.
mitigation_strategy: Prototype schema with 1M rows of dummy data before finalizing.

resource_notes: Integration point between UI and new Analytics API.
alternative_approach: Use React Query if SWR features are insufficient.
risk_factors: API payload structure mismatch causing rework.
mitigation_strategy: Define strict TypeScript interfaces for API responses ahead of implementation.
